FuncDef:
The multicast-virtual-scheduling family-user car-bandwidth-adjust enable command enables the function of adjusting the unicast CAR bandwidth of family users in multicast virtual scheduling scenarios.
The undo multicast-virtual-scheduling family-user unicast car-bandwidth-adjust enable command disables the function of adjusting the unicast CAR bandwidth of family users in multicast virtual scheduling scenarios.
By default, the function of adjusting unicast CAR bandwidth of family users is disabled in multicast virtual scheduling scenarios.
CLIs: undo multicast-virtual-scheduling family-user unicast car-bandwidth-adjust enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the total bandwidth of family users who apply for CAR resources is limited, to adjust unicast bandwidth to ensure multicast bandwidth, run the multicast-virtual-scheduling family-user car-bandwidth-adjust enable command.
Configuration Impact
After the multicast-virtual-scheduling family-user car-bandwidth-adjust enable command is run, both SQ and CAR bandwidth of family users will be adjusted when the total bandwidth is limited.
Precautions
The command configuration applies only to family users.
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
